name: Jumpscare
description: (Sneak + Primary) You appear behind the closest living entity.

actions.command: execute at @e[distance=0.1..15,type=!minecraft:area_effect_cloud,type=!minecraft:armor_stand,type=!minecraft:end_crystal,type=!minecraft:evoker_fangs,type=!minecraft:fishing_bobber,type=!minecraft:item_frame,type=!minecraft:leash_knot,type=!minecraft:lightning_bolt,type=!minecraft:painting,type=!minecraft:arrow,type=!minecraft:dragon_fireball,type=!minecraft:egg,type=!minecraft:ender_pearl,type=!minecraft:experience_bottle,type=!minecraft:eye_of_ender,type=!minecraft:fireball,type=!minecraft:firework_rocket,type=!minecraft:llama_spit,type=!minecraft:potion,type=!minecraft:shulker_bullet,type=!minecraft:small_fireball,type=!minecraft:snowball,type=!minecraft:spectral_arrow,type=!minecraft:trident,type=!minecraft:wither_skull,type=!minecraft:boat,type=!minecraft:chest_minecart,type=!minecraft:command_block_minecart,type=!minecraft:furnace_minecart,type=!minecraft:hopper_minecart,type=!minecraft:minecart,type=!minecraft:spawner_minecart,type=!minecraft:tnt_minecart,type=!minecraft:falling_block,type=!minecraft:tnt,type=!minecraft:experience_orb,type=!minecraft:item,limit=1,sort=nearest]
